mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eas_check_item_setting(operation_id, operation_no, is_sync_check_item) VALUES (#{item.operationId}, #{item.operationNo}, #{item.isSyncCheckItem})
mapper.select: SELECT ecis.id AS ID, ecis.operation_id AS operationId, ecis.operation_no AS operationNo, ecis.is_sync_check_item AS isSyncCheckItem FROM eas_check_item_setting AS ecis WHERE ecis.operation_id = #{operationId} AND ecis.operation_no = #{operationNo}
